#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
char str[105]="zyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba";
int main()
{
	int t,i,j,k;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	  cin>>j;
	  k=j/25;
	  i=j%25;
	  if(i==0)
	  cout<<&str[104-j-k]<<endl;
	  else
	  cout<<&str[103-j-k]<<endl;	
	}
	return 0;
}
